document_data.name: Bone Hook
document_data.mainbody: '''''Bone Hook''''' was a [[spell]] devised by [[Ohland Grethgar]] prior to becoming the [[Magister]].
document_data.Effects: The spell allowed a caster to trace their target no matter where they teleported or whatever shape they took.
document_data.History: The spell was used by [[Ohland Grethgar]] to pursue [[Uldinus Lawkland]].
